actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Environment and Public Works (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 96-15.

official_title: An original resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Environment and Public Works for inquiries and investigations.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 96-15) Authorizes additional expenditures by the Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works for inquiries and investigations from March 1, 1979, through February 29, 1980, not to exceed $1,386,200. Directs the Committee to report its findings and recommendations to the Senate not later than February 29, 1980.

titles.title: An original resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Environment and Public Works for inquiries and investigations.
